description: The Begonia 'River Nile' is an amazing plant species due to its beautiful colors and impressive hardiness. Its striking pink and white flowers trailing from its long stems will brighten up any room or garden. This attractive variety is also very easy to care for and can be grown in temperatures as low as 58Â°F. It loves the sun, so it's great for brightening up darker areas, and loves to be watered regularly. Its foliage is a rich deep green, making it perfect for borders or raised beds and it's sure to add an exotic touch to any garden.
